title: Welcome II the Terrordome (1995 - UK) ghetto sci fi action
description:
Welcome II the Terrordome (1995 - UK)

Drama / Science Fiction
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111681/


Verona Love Screens Film Festival - WON - Audience Award

This political action thriller was the first independent Black British feature film to be released.

A fast paced, vibrant, action thriller set in a decaying and racially segregated city of the near future. Employing a powerful mixture of historical narratives, the film charts the life of the McBride family over three traumatic centuries. Running parallel to the main themes of the simmering sexuality and interracial love are underlying stories of gang violence, police brutality and revenge. The visual style is strong and unflinching, the message biting.


Video: XviD, 640x480, 29.970 fps, 1871 Kbps, 01h29m55s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 448 kbps

DVDRip somewhat grainy, English audio, no subtitles
